name: Recorded Future
description: Gain access to Recorded Future's relevant cyber threat insights in real time

options.name: API Key
options.description: The API key to use to authenticate with Recorded Future

options.name: Minimum Score
options.description: The minimum score a threat must have to be displayed

options.name: Ignored Domains
options.description: Comma delimited list of domains that you do not want to lookup.

options.name: Domain Ignore List Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no domains will be ignored)

options.name: IP Ignore List Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no IPs will be ignored)

options.name: Max Concurrent Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests.  Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 25.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Lookups
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between lookups.  Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 50.
